story_26_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
So, how were the sync pairs the machine found
for you this time?
story_26_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: It’s OK... You don’t have to say it...
story_26_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: Our Sync Pair Pinger...was a failure.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Sorry, everyone. You believed in our invention,
even though you were short on time...
story_26_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: but we weren’t able to help you out...
story_26_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: Arara...don’t look so gloomy, you two!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah, you helped us a bunch!
Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_26_06000/2401_0301_0900_10: We got to battle a lot of sync pairs!
story_26_06000/2401_0401_1000_10: Yeah! It was fun battling everyone!
story_26_06000/2401_0402_1200_10:
Yup! Thanks to you guys, I got a lot of fantastic
shots of everyone, too!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: Well...maybe it didn’t work this time.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_1800_10: Look up at the sky, both of you.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I run an observatory, so every day I look up at the
sky, just like this.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_2000_10:
One day, I hope to discover a brand-new star
that nobody has ever seen before.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_2300_10: Thanks! I still haven’t discovered one yet, though.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_2400_10:
But if I don’t find one today, maybe I will 
tomorrow! And if not tomorrow, it might show up
the next day...
story_26_06000/2401_1001_2500_10:
But I’m sure I’ll find one eventually as long as I
don’t give up!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_2800_10:
As long as you keep on trying, one day you’ll
succeed! A setback doesn’t mean your work has
gone to waste.
story_26_06000/2401_1001_3200_10: We were so fixated on our failures...
story_26_06000/2401_1001_3300_10:
That’s fine! It shows that you’re passionate about
creating something that can help others!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_3500_10:
That said, we’re not quite done yet, are 
we, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_26_06000/2401_1001_3600_10: I was thinking about it, and—
story_26_06000/2401_1001_4100_10: They’re responding to the Sync Pair Pinger?
story_26_06000/2401_1001_4300_10: Of course! Clemont is a Gym Leader!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Yeah! Sophocles is a Captain...and Molayne is a
member of the Elite Four!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_4800_10:
I see. In that case, Soffy, Clemont, why don’t we
have a battle?
story_26_06000/2401_1001_5000_10:
No holding back, of course. After all, this is to help
out [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_26_06000/2401_0401_5400_10: Understood! If I’ve been chosen by the machine...
story_26_06000/2401_0401_5500_10: I’ll give it everything I’ve got!
story_26_06000/2401_0402_5800_10:
Right! I may have lost last time, but this time, I’m
gonna win!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_5900_10: Then it’s decided! Time for a battle!
story_26_06000/2401_1001_6000_10:
I’ll gladly show you the skills of a Trainer who
toughened up while adventuring alongside Kukui
back in the day!
